JOB DESCRIPTION: 1- 2 years of extensive experience as a developer on .NET Framework 4.5 and above,  C# 4.5 and above,  Web Services,  SQL Server and deep knowledge on either VB 6.0 and/ or real time experience. Knowledge of MVC architecture Candidate should be BE/ MCA. Solid understanding of object- oriented programming. Ability to design and optimize SQL Server stored procedures,  Trigger. Ability to adapt quickly to an existing,  complex environment. Ability to quickly learn new concepts and software is necessary. Candidate should be a self- motivated,  independent,  detail oriented,  responsible team- player.
